duties_responsibilities.duty: Represent the Company before zoning and planning boards for permits.
Draft, review, and negotiate a variety of contracts.
Advise on regulatory, real estate, land use, permitting, environmental, water supply, and water quality matters.
Provide legal support in environmental matters and water and wastewater permits.
Keep the Senior Utility Counsel informed on complex, sensitive, and material matters.
Draft and review legal documents for the use, acquisition, or disposition of real estate.
Represent utility subsidiaries in regulatory proceedings.
